casebody.data:
Harrison
v.
Gemma Power Systems, LLC, et al. 216A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 1, 2016 Fred D. Poisson, Jr., Attorney at Law, E. Stewart Poisson, Attorney at Law, for Harrison, Kerry Ray. Roger L. Dillard, Jr., Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, Jessica Lyles, Attorney at Law, for Gemma Power Systems, LLC, et al.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 30th of June 2016 by Plaintiff:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of July 2016."

Plaintiff shall have up to and including the 5th day of August 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
